cast.name: 奥姆卡·卡普尔 Omkar Kapoor

introduction: LaVaste is a reflection & action within the society which depicts the different shades and tells the gigantic truth of the society.This film talks about Satyansh, 28-year-old engineer lives in small Village of Chhattisgarh. After trying in many companies, he ends up doing some corporate jobs but enough salary & respect. Finally, he takes the job of transferring Unclaimed dead bodies. He always thought that nobody deserves to be abandoned or “Lawaris”. One night he was completely fed-up and he comes with one amazing idea to expand this business on a larger scale in a corporate style. But his main motto was not only to expand business but also was to provide a proper & rightful crimination for unclaimed dead bodies. Soon his idea turns into a big company named “LaVaste” and they all become successful. But I. the process he loses his soul that becomes a new tragedy of his life.This film is for the present time frame where the new generation is doing serious mistakes whiles their career planning. This is not a good or bad film; this an important film to make
